content:
Hey all! This is a repost from here (not sure how to move posts if possible):
https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179166-implementers/topic/HL7.20V2.20messaging.20schemas/near/246661976

TL;DR: I think there is a data quality issue with the HL7v2 messaging schemas here: https://www.hl7.org/implement/standards/product_brief.cfm?product_id=213 ... so I am wondering what is the best way to access (or generate myself) an up-to-date/corrected schema data set? Thanks so much!
As stated on the other stream an update is on its way...
